meanings.definition: To make or become aware of something through the senses.
meanings.sent1: She ensates the fresh flowers by smelling them.
meanings.sent2: I ensate the warmth of the sun on my skin.
meanings.sent3: The cat ensates the delicious fish with its keen sense of smell.
meanings.sent4: The music ensates memories of happy times.
meanings.sent5: The chef ensates the flavors in the dish with precision.

meanings.definition: To perceive or recognize something through the senses.
meanings.sent1: He ensates danger in the dark alley.
meanings.sent2: The child ensates the sweetness of the candy.
meanings.sent3: The detective ensates the hidden clues in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition ensates the truth behind the words.
meanings.sent5: The artist ensates the beauty of nature in the painting.

meanings.definition: To experience or feel something through the senses.
meanings.sent1: They ensate the excitement of the roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent2: We ensate the cool breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The puppy ensates the joy of playing in the park.
meanings.sent4: The actor ensates the character's emotions on stage.
meanings.sent5: The explorer ensates the wonder of new discoveries.
